title: EXCLUSIVE: Yulia Skripal speaks about poisioning
text:
EXCLUSIVE: Yulia Skripal speaks about poisioning 01:38
Yulia Skripal has spoken to Reuters for the first time on camera since recovering from a poisoning on UK soil that Britain has blamed on Russia. Yulia was hospitalized along with her father Sergei Skripal in a nerve agent attack in March. Jacob Greaves reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Yulia Skripal has spoken to Reuters for the first time on camera since recovering from a poisoning on UK soil that Britain has blamed on Russia. Yulia was hospitalized along with her father Sergei Skripal in a nerve agent attack in March. Jacob Greaves reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KQKzWW
